segments.text: I notice the contrast between the calm outside and the chaos brewing inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is like a daredevil, pushing his luck with every cookie he snatches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical the way he balances, yet my stomach churns with worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, standing there so expectantly, she makes it all the more tempting to root for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart sinks a little as I think of the mess that’s about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but part of me knows they wouldn’t listen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment filled with innocent mischief, but it’s teetering on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
